text: Ara yara imana eneche tara bale, ‘ekati sura nayila haya na kena?’ Atahpara yadi ‘muhakama’ [1] kono sura nayila haya ebam tate yud'dhera kono nirdesa thake apani dekhabena yadera antare roga ache tara mrtyubhaye bih‌bala manusera mata apanara dike takacche [2]. Sutaram tadera jan'ya uttama hato
